comments.comment: Dependencies in node js are the external packages we need to install for the proper functioning of our program.Dependencies are typically managed using a package manager, and the most common package manager for Node.js is npm (Node Package Manager).
comments.Types: Dependencies are mainly if 2 types => regular and developer .
comments.regular: These are the dependencies that the application requires to run correctly during its execution or runtime
comments.devdependenies: These are the dependencies that are needed during the development phase of the application but are not required for the application to run in a production environment

devDependencies.comment: To install it globally ,=> npm install nodemon --global
